GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v5.15.65
GSD.description:
kprobes: don't call disarm_kprobe() for disabled kprobes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.65 by commit 55c7a91527343d2e0b5647cc308c6e04ddd2aa52, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit 69d54b916d83872a0a327778a01af2a096923f59. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: kprobes: don't call disarm_kprobe() for disabled kprobes
